entry.title: Sunday: A few showers. High 26.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then a few showers. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 26. Humidex 29. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few showers ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. A few rain showers and wet flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
